name: Aress Software
description:
Aress Software is the IT partner that brings technology and trust to the table. We are CMMi Level 3 as well as ISO 9001:2008 and ISO 27001:2005 certified. We are Microsoft Gold Certified for software development as well as technical support services, a Salesforce.com Consulting Partner and Standard Consulting Partner with Amazon Web Services (AWS). That means that dealing with us is not like dealing with freelance developers or smaller, less mature companies.
We consistently deliver quality deliverables on time and to the customer's satisfaction. Aress Software, established in 1999, is now around 550 people company. We are based in India, the US and the UK.
